revised_title: Self-Order and Form in Polymeric Materials: Self-Order in Flexible Non-Mesogenic Macromolecules
tldr: This article discusses the self-ordering behavior of flexible, non-mesogenic macromolecules, specifically linear and cyclolinear polyorganosiloxanes. These materials can form thermodynamically stable thermotropic ordered phases with two-dimensional long-range order and short-range order along the chain direction. The article explores the influence of molecular structure, molecular mass, and side-chain length on the temperature stability and phase behavior of these materials.
